topic.title: Introduction to VlppRegex
topic.p: VlppRegex provides string matching utilities based on regular expressions. Here is what you can get from this library:

ul.li: Regex: A regular expression class with string matching and other features.

topic.title: Lexical analyzer based on regular expressions

ul.li: RegexTokens: Token iterator for lexical analyzed text, from RegexLexer::Parse.
RegexLexerWalker: Lexical analyzer that provides information when consuming each character, from RegexLexer::Walk.
RegexLexerColorizer: Text colorizer for lexical analyzed text, from RegexLexer::Colorize.

topic.p: This lexical analyzer also supports context-sensitive token, which requires user-provided callbacks instead of just setting regular expressions.
